name: The ToS are only translated into a few languages
title: Spotify's TOS is only translated into a few languages

tosdr.tldr: Although Spotify allows users to choose their country (Andorra, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Monaco, Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States), the terms themselves are only available in English, French, German, and Spanish.
